admin-management.title: Admin Management
admin-management.subtitle: Add and remove administrations to/from this platform

remove-dialog.title: Remove admin '{{username}}'?
remove-dialog.description: By removing this administrator, the user will immediately lose access to the admin area. The administrator can be re-added at any time.

add-dialog.title: Add new admin
add-dialog.description: By adding a new administrator, the user will immediately gain access to the admin area. Be sure to insert a valid username, since it is not validated against existing users.

election-management.title: Election Management
election-management.subtitle: Create, edit and see results of elections

error.description: Oops! An error has occurred while logging in

login.loading: Hang tight... We're logging you in
